1.0.0.en: First support for API connected BlauHoff devices

1.1.5.en: Fixed issue with controlling Deye inverters

1.2.0.en: Allow Time of Use for Deye

1.2.3.en: Primitive Solarman support and command queueing

1.3.0.en: Allow communication over Solarman local API

2.0.0.en: Support Deye and Afore inverters, over both Modbus and Solarman dongle

2.0.1.en: Allow pairing the same device through modbus and solarman

2.1.0.en: Allow reuse of retrieved value, optimizing requests made to inverter

2.1.1.en: For Afore, allow AC charging timeslot setting

2.1.2.en: Afore AC Timing Charge flows added

2.1.4.en: Removed old device, updated texts, documentation, etc

2.4.2.en: Validate values before writing and after reading.

2.4.3.en: Keep requests in the right order

2.4.4.en: Add more properties for the Afore inverter
